INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( USER_CODE, SHOW_CODE, SEAT_CODE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ? )

SELECT R.RESERVATION_CODE, U.USER_CODE, W.SHOW_CODE, S.SEAT_CODE
FROM RESERVATION R JOIN `USER` U ON R.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE JOIN `SHOW` W ON R.SHOW_CODE = W.SHOW_CODE JOIN SEAT S ON R.SEAT_CODE = S.SEAT_CODE WHERE R.RESERVATION_CODE = ?
UPDATE RESERVATION SET SHOW_CODE = ?, SEAT_CODE = ? WHERE RESERVATION_CODE = ?
